quotes.text: Motivation may be what starts you off, but it's habit that keeps you going back for more.
I'm not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
Push yourself again and again. Don't give an inch until the final buzzer sounds.
Certain things catch your eye, but pursue only those that capture the heart.
Better to be an optimist who gets disappointed than a pessimist who has no hope.
These mountains that you are carrying, you were only supposed to climb.
Suffering is a test. That's all it is. Suffering is the true test of life.
Just because one person doesn't seem to care for you, doesn't mean you should forget about everyone else who does.
You may have had unfair things happen to you, but the depth of your pain is an indication of the height of your future.
There is nothing wrong with dreaming, but there is everything wrong with dreaming without any intention to make the dream a reality.
Working on your dream whenever it is convenient for you will not work. When you dare to dream, you should also dare to do.
Just slow down. Slow down your speech. Slow down your breathing. Slow down your walking. Slow down your eating. And let this slower, steadier pace perfume your mind. Just slow down.
Sometimes things aren't clear right away. That's where you need to be patient and persevere and see where things lead.
The key is not to prioritize what's on your schedule, but to schedule your priorities.
You draw to you the people and events which resonate with the energy that you are radiating. You attract what you are, so be your best.
Social anxiety results from being around people who are resolutely opposed to who you are.
People often avoid making decisions out of fear of making a mistake. Actually the failure to make decisions is one of life's biggest mistakes.
I have nothing in common with lazy people who blame others for their lack of success.
Just because you miss someone doesn't mean you need them back in your life. Missing is just a part of moving on.
Follow your dreams. I am not saying it's going to be easy, but I am saying it's going to be worth it.
The mind is like water. When it's turbulent, it's difficult to see. When it's calm, everything becomes clear.
The only thing limiting your aspiration is your imagination.
You must train your intuition - you must trust the small voice inside you which tells you exactly what to say, what to decide.
Without desires and dreams, your thoughts do not matter and you can think whatever you want to.
Try a thing you haven't done three times. Once, to get over the fear of doing it. Twice, to learn how to do it. And a third time to figure out whether you like it or not.
They say "Follow your heart"... But I can't follow you where you're going...
Making a dream into reality begins with what you have, not with what you are waiting on.
If we didn't have nightmares, we wouldn't wake up every morning chasing our dreams.
The answer is in your dreams, the ones you dream while you're asleep and the ones you dream while you're awake.
Having a routine is great, but only if it serves your goals. If it's not doing that, it's called a rut.
Either write something worth reading or do something worth writing.
Don't live to be judged for what you haven't done. Live to be judged for what you have done.
Integrity is choosing courage over comfort; it's choosing what's right over what's fun, fast, or easy; and it's practicing your values, not just professing them.
I read somewhere how important it is in life not necessarily to be strong but to feel strong.
Self-discipline is about controlling your desires and impulses while staying focused on what needs to get done to achieve your goal.
All I can do is follow my instincts, because I'll never please everyone.
Long term success is a direct result of what you achieve everyday. Goals provide your daily routine.
Spend more time doing things that make you forget about the time.
When you only focus on your goals you never see any obstacles.
If you find yourself mentally exhausted: change your environment. Unclutter your desk. Take a shower. Go for a a walk. Refresh your mental state.
All men desire peace, but very few desire those things that make for peace.
Don't step backward toward nothing, step forward toward something, better awkward steps forward, than coward steps backward.
I am not looking to escape my darkness, I'm learning to love myself here.
It's amazing how quickly things can turn around when you remove toxic people from your life.
Companionship is a foreign concept to some people. They fear it as much as the majority of people fear loneliness.
Face the demands of life voluntarily. Respond to a challenge, instead of bracing for catastrophe.
Whatever happens to you belongs to you. Make it yours. Feed it to yourself even if it feels impossible to swallow. Let it nurture you because it will.
When your inner commentary finally ends, your happiness can finally begin.
It's very hard to respect yourself when you give in to every temptation. If you want to build self-respect, build your willpower.
Unless you try to do something beyond what you have already mastered, you will never grow.
Being honest with yourself is the highest form of self-respect. If you're not feeling something, don't do it.
Follow your dreams, work hard, practice, and persevere. Make sure you eat a variety of foods, get plenty of exercise and maintain a healthy lifestyle.
I have a lot to be thankful for. I am healthy, happy and I am loved.
There is progress whether ye are going forward or backward! The thing is to move!
I don't believe you have to be better than everybody else. I believe you have to be better than you ever thought you could be.
If we were meant to stay in one place, we'd have roots instead of feet.
I'd rather attempt to do something great and fail than to attempt to do nothing and succeed.
We can change our future by merely changing our attitude to the positive. Simple yet powerful.
Most people are fast to stop you before you get started but hesitate to get in the way if you're moving.
Give yourself the love you seek, and the universe will send people who match it.
When you have a lot of confidence and you feel like nobody can beat you, it's game over for everyone else.
The first step towards getting somewhere is to decide you're not going to stay where you are.
Life is like a box of chocolates, you never know what you're going to get.
Energy is contagious, positive and negative alike. I will forever be mindful of what and who I am allowing into my space.
If you have good thoughts, they will shine out of your face like sunbeams and you will always look lovely.
Breath is the power behind all things. I breathe in and know that good things will happen.
You aren't asking for too much. You're just asking the wrong person.
You can never quit. Winners never quit, and quitters never win.
You may never know what results come of your actions, but if you do nothing, there will be no results.
Your beliefs become your thoughts, your thoughts become your words, your words become your actions, your actions become your habits, Your habits become your values, your values become your destiny.
Focusing on your future makes you realize more opportunities than ever.
Let go of what has passed. Let go of what may come. Let go of what is happening now. Don't try to figure anything out. Don't try to make anything happen. Relax, right now, and rest.
Enjoy the little things, for one day you may look back and realize they were the big things.
I do believe that if you haven't learnt about sadness, you cannot appreciate happiness.
When you need to calm down... Breathe in for 5 counts. Hold for 5 counts. Breathe out for 5 counts. Hold for 5 counts. Repeat the cycle 2 more times.
I learned how to be happy because I know what unhappiness felt like.
You don't get to choose how you're going to die. Or when. You can only decide how you're going to live. Now.
Happiness hides in life's small details. If you're not looking, it becomes invisible.
If you want to move to a higher level of life, you have to be willing to let go of some of your old ways of thinking and being and adopt new ones.

Let go of the fears, worries, and doubts. If you have to write them down on a piece of paper and burn them, do it. Have a funeral for your fears, worries, and doubts. Let them rest in peace so that you can live, work, and play in peace.
May you know that every experience will teach and lead you to the integral parts in the seasons of your growth.
Be patient with yourself. You are growing stronger every day. The weight of the world will become lighter and you will begin to shine brighter. Don't give up.
Treat yourself as if you were someone that you are responsible for helping.
Enter every activity without giving mental recognition to the possibility of defeat. Concentrate on your strengths, instead of your weaknesses, on your powers, instead of your problems.
You are allowed to be both a masterpiece and a work in progress, simultaneously.
To wish you were someone else is to waste the person you are.
The mistakes I've made are dead to me. But I can't take back the things I never did.
One of the things that makes me who I am is the loyalty I have to people I hold close to my heart.
Every time you are tempted to react in the same old way, ask if you want to be a prisoner of the past or a pioneer of the future.
But I have my life, I'm living it. It's twisted, exhausting, uncertain and full of guilt, but nonetheless, there's something there.
People who project negativity typically have low self-esteem. They feel badly about themselves, and their negativity is simply a reflection of those feelings.

Watch your thoughts; they become words. Watch your words; they become actions. Watch your actions; they become habits. Watch your habits; they become character. Watch your character; it becomes your destiny.
All I can control is myself and just keep having a positive attitude.
Forget yesterday and last month and last year, with their gloomy diary of failures and disappointments. All that is in the past.
People will always have their opinion on you despite who you are and what your capable of.
Love grows from stable relationships, shared experience, loyalty, devotion, trust.
The first steps in self-acceptance are not at all pleasant, for what one sees is not a happy sight. One needs all the courage to go further.
Chaotic people often have chaotic lives, and I think they create that. But if you try and have an inner peace and a positive attitude, I think you attract that.
Spend eighty percent of your time focusing on the opportunities of tomorrow rather than the problems of yesterday.
Letting go doesn't mean that you don't care about someone anymore. It's just realizing that the only person you really have control over is yourself.
Don't blow off another's candle for it won't make yours shine brighter.
Life isn't about getting and having, it's about giving and being.
Our expectations determine how we respond. Be careful what you expect.
Don't look for reasons to be happy. Life is short life is uncertain be happy because you are still alive.
Maybe you have to know the darkness before you can appreciate the light.
It's failure that gives you the proper perspective on success.
In moments of uncertainty immerse yourself in the life you would be most proud to live.
To experience peace does not mean that your life is always blissful. It means that you are capable of tapping into a blissful state of mind amidst the normal chaos of a hectic life.
The best reason to start an organization is to make meaning; to create a product or service to make the world a better place.
Most people would sooner die than think; in fact, they do so.
Passion serves its purpose to help give a person motivation to learn the necessary skills and overcome the hardships they're going to face.
If the people in your circle aren't contributing to your growth, then you're not in a circle, you're in a cage.
In times of stress, the best thing we can do for each other is to listen with our ears and our hearts and to be assured that our questions are just as important as our answers.
Better to do something imperfectly than to do nothing flawlessly.
It takes courage to examine your life and to decide that there are things you would like to change, and it takes even more courage to do something about it.
Meet every level of frustration with a greater level of character.
Think big and don't listen to people who tell you it can't be done. Life's too short to think small.
Closure happens right after you accept that letting go and moving on is more important than projecting a fantasy of how the relationship could have been.
Become addicted to constant and never-ending self-improvement.
Work hard! In the end, passion and hard work beat out natural talent.
Strength is the product of struggle. You must do what others don't to achieve what others wont.
People are chasing cash, not happiness. When you chase money, you're going to lose. You're just going to. Even if you get the money, you're not going to be happy.
The voice of passion is better than the voice of reason. The passionless cannot change history.
Lift up the weak; inspire the ignorant. Rescue the failures; encourage the deprived. Live to give. Don't only hustle for survival. Go, and settle for revival.
Negative emotions like loneliness, envy, and guilt have an important role to play in a happy life; they're big, flashing signs that something needs to change.
A very small degree of hope is sufficient to cause the birth of love.
We don't develop courage by being happy every day. We develop it by surviving difficult times and challenging adversity.
Growth is the great separator between those who succeed and those who do not. When I see a person beginning to separate themselves from the pack, it's almost always due to personal growth.
Follow your own passion - not your parents', not your teachers' - yours.
Hard times don't create heroes. It is during the hard times when the 'hero' within us is revealed.
Sometimes you can only find heaven by slowly backing away from hell.
Going through anxiety or depression or any other psychological condition doesn't make you unlovable - it makes you human.
I think it's great to be flawed. I am hugely flawed, and I like it this way. That's the fun of life.
Body love is about self-worth in general. It's more than our physical appearance.
Depressed means you need deep rest from the character you've been playing in the world.
Don't think about making art, just get it done. Let everyone else decide if it's good or bad, whether they love it or hate it. While they are deciding, make even more art.
You can't defeat the darkness by keeping it caged inside of you.
Happiness can't be traveled to owned, earned, worn or consumed. Happiness is the spiritual experience of living every minute with love, grace, and gratitude.
First, accept sadness. Realize that without losing, winning isn't so great.

From the very beginning you are being told to compare yourself with others. This is the greatest disease; it is like a cancer that goes on destroying your very soul because each individual is unique, and comparison is not possible.
It's beautiful to be alone. To be alone does not mean to be lonely. It means the mind is not influenced and contaminated by society.
Awakening is not changing who you are, but discarding who you are not.

Is it so bad then to be misunderstood? Pythagoras was misunderstood, and Socrates, and Jesus, and Luther, and Copernicus, and Galileo, and Newton, and every pure and wise spirit that ever took flesh. To be great is to be misunderstood.

Trauma is personal. It does not disappear if it is not validated. When it is ignored or invalidated the silent screams continue internally heard only by the one held captive. When someone enters the pain and hears the screams healing can begin.

Learn this from me. Holding anger is a poison. It eats you from inside. We think that hating is a weapon that attacks the person who harmed us. But hatred is a curved blade. And the harm we do, we do to ourselves.
You should feel beautiful and you should feel safe. What you surround yourself with should bring you peace of mind and peace of spirit.

Stay positive. Forgive others. Invest in yourself. Trust your instincts. Lead with an open heart. Don't let others ruin your day. Do things that bring you joy. Be of service to humanity. Find your soul tribe. Love yourself.
Training gives us an outlet for suppressed energies created by stress and thus tones the spirit just as exercise conditions the body.
Mental problems feed on the attention that you give them. The more you worry about them, the stronger they become. If you ignore them, they lose their power and finally vanish.

I always tell myself "the bad times never last". It will end. The good days are just around the corner.' Knowing there is always an end to the down moods always helps me to get through that day/week/month.
Don't worry about what you can't control. Our focus and energy needs to be on the things we can control. Attitude, effort, focus - these are the things we can control.
A man too busy to take care of his health is like a mechanic too busy to take care of his tools.
Holding on to anger, resentment and hurt only gives you tense muscles, a headache and a sore jaw from clenching your teeth. Forgiveness gives you back the laughter and the lightness in your life.
What I lack in talent, I compensate with my willingness to grind it out. That's the secret of my life.

Be yourself; no base imitator of another, but your best self. There is something which you can do better than another. Listen to the inward voice and bravely obey that. Do the things at which you are great, not what you were never made for.
The moment you know yourself you have known the most precious thing in existence.
Find joy in everything you choose to do. Every job, relationship, home‚Ä¶ It's your responsibility to love it, or change it.
The natural healing force in each one of us is the greatest force in getting well.
It is when we are alone that we receive the opportunity to build a relationship with who we truly are.
When admiring other people's gardens, don't forget to tend to your own flowers.
I'm going to do what I want to do. I'm going to be who I really am. And I'm going to figure out what that is.
Hardship is a blessing when it spurs effort and development; ease is a curse when it increases complacency and self-indulgence.
I learned long ago to focus on things you can control and don't even pay attention to things you don't.
There are friendships imprinted in our hearts that will never be diminished by time and distance.

Start living in discomfort. Gradually increase it little by little, and you will steadily grow. If you want sudden growth, deluge yourself in great discomfort and do not retreat from it. The more discomfort you are willing to bear, the more you can grow.
You can't do anything as long as you are afraid of what might happen. No matter what the problem is, we must muster up the courage to face it.
Vision creates faith and faith creates willpower. With faith there is no anxiety and no doubt - just absolute confidence in yourself.
You, and only you, are ultimately responsible for who you become and how happy you are.
You learn far more from negative leadership than from positive leadership. Because you learn how not to do it. And, therefore, you learn how to do it.

Always do your best. Your best is going to change from moment to moment; it will be different when you are healthy as opposed to sick. Under any circumstance, simply do your best, and you will avoid self-judgment, self-abuse and regret.

Like success, failure is many things to many people. With a positive attitude, failure is a learning experience, a rung on the ladder, a plateau at which to get your thoughts in order and prepare to try again.
I think anything is possible if you have the mindset and the will and desire to do it and put the time in.
Satisfaction consists in freedom from pain, which is the positive element of life.
You must not under any pretense allow your mind to dwell on any thought that is not positive, constructive, optimistic, kind.
If things aren't going so well, I try to stay positive and not give in to negative thoughts.
Instead of hating, I have chosen to forgive and spend all of my positive energy on changing the world.
People destined to meet will do so, apparently by chance, at precisely the right moment.
I think a lot of times we don't pay enough attention to people with a positive attitude because we assume they are naive or stupid or unschooled.
A sense of blessedness comes from a change of heart, not from more blessings.
I believe that you should gravitate to people who are doing productive and positive things with their lives.
Once you make a decision, the universe conspires to make it happen.
Surrender to what is, let go of what was, have faith in what will be.

Keep my word positive. Words become my behaviors. Keep my behaviors positive. Behaviors become my habits. Keep my habits positive. Habits become my values. Keep my values positive. Values become my destiny.
I've learned that positive thinking and encouragement are essential for leadership and progress.
We are by nature observers, and thereby learners. That is our permanent state.
Before we acquire great power we must acquire wisdom to use it well.
There are powers inside of you which, if you could discover and use, would make of you everything you ever dreamed or imagined you could become.
Everything you want is out there waiting for you to ask. Everything you want also wants you. But you have to take action to get it.
Go into the world and do well. But more importantly, go into the world and do good.
Instead of looking at the hundred reasons to quit, look at the thousand reasons not to give up.
Do not make your goal to be the best. Best is a label. It's something someone else decides for you. 'Better' is more personal.
The greatest lesson that I learned in all of this is that you have to start. Start now, start here, start small and keep it simple.

Never cut a tree down in the wintertime. Never make a negative decision in the low time. Never make your most important decisions when you are in your worst moods. Wait. Be patient. The storm will pass. The spring will come.
The most beautiful discovery true friends make is that they can grow separately without growing apart.
If everything was perfect, you would never learn and you would never grow.
Life becomes easier when you learn to accept an apology you never got.
The best way to create a better future is to do your best at this very moment.
Don't be afraid of your fears. They're not there to scare you. They're there to let you know that something is worth it.

I'm here to tell you that if you get broken, it's possible to put yourself back together. I'm here to tell you that if you get lost, it's possible that a light will come, dancing, on the horizon, to lead you home.
If there's one thing I learned, it's that nobody is here forever. You have to live for the moment, each and every day... The here, the now.
Anything is possible when you have the right people there to support you.
Both good and bad days should end with productivity. Your mood affairs should never influence your work.
Life is short, and if we enjoy every moment of every day, then we will be happy no matter what happens or what changes along the way.
True friendship comes when the silence between two people is comfortable.
The point is to be in the moment, not miss the moment while trying to capture it.
Remember to do everything with an abundance of love, so that one day you will remember the beauty of every moment lived.
The person who doesn't value you is blocking you from the one who will. Let them go.
They say a person needs just three things to be truly happy in this world: someone to love, something to do, and something to hope for.
A positive attitude is something everyone can work on, and everyone can learn how to employ it.
To be true to yourself, you must risk being disliked by others for not living up to their expectation of you.
Real leadership is leaders recognizing that they serve the people that they lead.
To be able to move on, one has to learn to forgive not only the person (or people) who have done one wrong but also oneself.
The more you are positive and say, 'I want to have a good life,' the more you build that reality for yourself by creating the life that you want.
Having the positive belief that it will all be O.K. just means that you hustle and make it work because failure is not even an option in your own mind.

Keep on beginning and failing. Each time you fail, start all over again, and you will grow stronger until you have accomplished a purpose - not the one you began with perhaps, but one you'll be glad to remember.
Nothing you become will disappoint me; I have no preconception that I'd like to see you be or do. I have no desire to forsee you, only to discover you. You can't disappoint me.

Let go of certainty. The opposite isn't uncertainty. It's openness, curiosity and a willingness to embrace paradox, rather than choose up sides. The ultimate challenge is to accept ourselves exactly as we are, but never stop trying to learn and grow.
Crying does not indicate that you are weak. Since birth, it has always been a sign that you are alive.
Growth means change and change involves risk, stepping from the known to the unknown.
By thinking about your goals every morning, many times during the day, and every night, you begin moving toward it and bringing it toward you.
There is enormous power in nailing your morning routine, but there's even more power in adapting to it when it doesn't happen as we'd like.
Decide carefully, exactly what you want in life, then work like mad to make sure you get it.
Personal growth is not a matter of learning new information but unlearning old limits.
The only thing that matters in life is your own opinion about yourself, your own respect for yourself. Nobody can destroy your dignity then.
In a growth mindset, challenges are exciting rather than threatening. So rather than thinking, oh, I'm going to reveal my weaknesses, you say, wow, here's a chance to grow.
When I feel lost and can't make a decision, I just stop and get quiet. I take a time-out.
Love should never cost you your peace. It should never cost you your joy. It should never cost you your happiness.
Growth is simply learning how to suffer gracefully, elegantly and not letting your pain completely tear you apart.
A man who believes in freedom will do anything under the sun to acquire, or preserve his freedom.

Stop hustling if your health is suffering. If you can't manage your thoughts, take care of them. If your relationships are dying, bring them back to life. Your dreams want the best from you so please make all of you a priority.
Leave your ego at the door every morning, and just do some truly great work. Few things will make you feel better than a job brilliantly done.
Climb the mountain not to plant your flag, but to embrace the challenge, enjoy the air and behold the view. Climb it so you can see the world, not so the world can see you.
Take chances, make mistakes. That's how you grow. Pain nourishes your courage. You have to fail in order to practice being brave.
Recognizing that you are not where you want to be is a starting point to begin changing your life.
Life is changing all the time and if we fail to change with it we get left behind.
The tragedy of life is not that it ends so soon, but that we wait so long to begin it.
The journey isn't about becoming a different person. It's about loving who you are right now.
Well, if it can be thought, it can be done, a problem can be overcome.

Life seems sometimes like nothing more than a series of losses, from beginning to end. That's the given. How you respond to those losses, what you make of what's left, that's the part you have to make up as you go.
Transitions are almost always signs of growth but they can bring feelings of loss. To get somewhere new, we may have to leave somewhere else behind.
We need to get rid of the fear and guilt we might have for asserting ourselves. It serves no purpose except to keep us down.
Once you start practicing being grateful and thankful for things, people, and events, you may notice that you start to attract more positive things, people, and events in your life.
Man cannot discover new oceans unless he has the courage to lose sight of the shore.
The goal is not to simply eliminate the bad, but to pursue and experience the best in the world.
Greatness is setting ambitious goals that your former self would have thought impossible, and trying to get a little better every day.
The question you should be asking isn't, "What do I want?" or "What are my goals?" but "What would excite me?"

If we read the stories of the great spiritual teachers of the past, we find that they have attained spiritual realization through a great deal of meditation, solitude and practice. They did not take any shortcuts.
Our problem is that we choose to deny love. In fact, we only have one problem: that our mind chooses fear over love.
To enjoy life, you don't need fancy nonsense, but you do need to control your time and realize that most things just aren't as serious as you make them out to be.
Out of suffering have emerged the strongest souls; the most massive characters are seared with scars.
Express gratitude and appreciation, it is so simple but will transform and change your life.
There are two kinds of guilt: the kind that drowns you until you're useless, and the kind that fires your soul to purpose.
It isn't enough to think outside the box. Thinking is passive. Get used to acting outside the box.
According to the Law of Attraction, the physical reality that you experience at present is drawn towards the future probability you desired when it attains more power.
In school as in life, having a reputation for being assertive will help you receive preferential treatment without having to beg or fight for it every time.
Do one thing at a time, and while doing it put your whole soul into it to the exclusion of all else.
But you are the average of the five people you associate with most, so do not underestimate the effects of your pessimistic, unambitious, or disorganized friends.
It is possible to become world-class, enter the top 5% of performers in the world, in almost any subject within 6-12 months, or even 6-12 weeks.
They laugh at me because I'm different; I laugh at them because they're all the same.
Let my soul smile through my heart and my heart smile through my eyes, that I may scatter rich smiles in sad hearts.
First principle: never to let one's self be beaten down by persons or by events.
People are fond of using the "it's not what you know, it's who you know" adage as an excuse for inaction, as if all successful people are born with powerful friends.
Believe it can be done. When you believe something can be done, really believe, your mind will find the ways to do it. Believing a solution paves the way to the solution.
$1,000,000 in the bank isn't the fantasy. The fantasy is the lifestyle of complete freedom it supposedly allows.
If you believe you can change the world, do what you believe is right and expect resistance and expect attackers.
You can't build a dream on a foundation of sand. To weather the test of storms, it must be cemented in the heart with uncompromising conviction.
To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream; not only plan, but also believe.
It's all about falling in love with yourself and sharing that love with someone who appreciates you, rather than looking for love to compensate for a self-love deficit.
Self-worth is so vital to your happiness if you don't feel good about you, it's hard to feel good about anything else.
Surround yourself with the dreamers, and the doers, the believers, and thinkers, but most of all, surround yourself with those who see the greatness within you, even when you don't see it yourself.
I don't think people realize how much strength it takes to pull your own self out of a poisonous situation with someone you love deeply. So if you've done that today or any day, I'm proud of you.
You need time to think, time to dream, time to talk and time to do nothing at all.

Do not be scared to say "I love you" to yourself. Stand in front of the mirror and look at yourself and say to yourself as loudly as you can "I love you. I respect you for what you have faced in life. And I love you for what you have become."
Be the hardest working person you can be. That's how you separate yourself from the competition.
If you do not respect your own wishes, no one else will. You will simply attract people who disrespect you as much as you do.

If you want to be happy, learn to be alone without being lonely. Learn that being alone does not mean being unhappy. The world is full of plenty of interesting and enjoyable things to do and people who can enrich your life.
You got this. One day at a time. You are resilient, courageous, and capable. Be proud of yourself. It isn't easy enduring depression/anxiety.
Every relationship you have is a reflection of your relationship with your self.
Do not wait; the time will never be 'just right.' Start where you stand, and work with whatever tools you may have at your command, and better tools will be found as you go along.
It is not easy to be a person of high standards; you have to pay for it. It does, however, make you stand out from the crowd, which alone makes it worth more than its price.
When you have confidence, you can have a lot of fun. And when you have fun, you can do amazing things.
A man who fears suffering is already suffering from what he fears.
It is one of the blessings of old friends that you can afford to be stupid with them.
Affirmations are a powerful tool to deliberately install desired beliefs about yourself.
By recording your dreams and goals on paper, you set in motion the process of becoming the person you most want to be. Put your future in good hands - your own.
Never do tomorrow what you can do today. Procrastination is the thief of time.
If you continue to think the way you've always thought, you'll continue to get what you've always got.
If the wounds on her heart and the bruises on her soul were translated on her skin, you wouldn't recognize her at all.
The reason people find it so hard to be happy is that they always see the past better than it was, the present worse than it is, and the future less resolved than it will be.
Life is uncertain don't waste your time on such things that don't deserve your time and efforts instead do things you love and live your life to fullest.
When you want to succeed as bad as you want to breathe, then you will be successful.
